author: Daniel Peters For Daily Mail Australia
title: Mother tells son: 'watch out for terrorists' in Best&Less | Daily Mail Online
text: comments A man shopping in a Best and Less store has recalled the horrific moment a mother warned her teenage son to 'be careful' because there were 'terrorists about.' In a post published by the Islamophobia Register Australia, the anonymous man detailed the casually racist moment at the Australian retailer. 'A lady just walked past me in (Best and Less) and said to her high school aged son (loud enough for me to hear) 'be careful, there are terrorists about',' he wrote. A man shopping in a Best and Less store has recalled the horrific moment a mother warned her teenage son to 'be careful' because there were 'terrorists about' 'Thank you politicians and media for giving her the confidence to say it out loud.' 'Be careful everyone, there are racists about. #islamophobia #racism.' The post attracted a number of comments - largely condemning the woman for the comment she made to her son. RELATED ARTICLES
